sentence.Network_en: In the 17 years of his misrule, famines intensified and rebellions multiplied.
sentence.Network_cn: 他17年执政不善，这期间饥荒加剧，暴乱迭起。

sentence.Network_en: He was arrested last December, accused of corruption and misrule.
sentence.Network_cn: 他因受到贪污和蠹政的指控于去年12月被捕。

sentence.Network_en: The regime finally collapsed after 25 years of misrule.
sentence.Network_cn: 在施行了25年的蠹政后，这个政权最终垮台。

... maladministration;misrule 弊政 The country suffers year of misrule under a weak king. 该国因国王懦弱而长期混乱不治。.

list.abs: The chief umpire misruled again , and the crowd booed loundly ., 主裁判又一次误判 , 只听场外传来一阵唏嘘声.

democracy , hard argument and open contest are alive , kicking and reasonably well in at least two countries where street protest prevailed against post-Soviet misrule in a spectacular way .至少在两个街道抗议活动彻底战胜了前苏联暴政的国家里，民主政治、激烈的争论和公开竞争是活跃、热闹和相当不错的。

entry.tran: 执政不善;蠹政;治理不当
entry.def: If you refer to someone's government of a country as misrule, you are critical of them for governing their country badly or unfairly.

example.ex: He was arrested last December, accused of corruption and misrule...
example.tran: 他因受到贪污和蠹政的指控于去年12月被捕。

example.ex: In the 17 years of his misrule, famines intensified and rebellions multiplied.
example.tran: 他17年执政不善，这期间饥荒加剧，暴乱迭起。

means.word_mean: 1. government that is inefficient or dishonest

auth_sentence.content: Rife with ego and misrule, network television seems to demand satirical treatment.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rife with ego and misrule, network television seems to demand satirical treatment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rife with ego and misrule, network television seems to demand satirical treatment.

auth_sentence.content: Protesters bemoan the economic hardships they blame on the misrule and greed of their current crop of leaders.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Protesters bemoan the economic hardships they blame on the misrule and greed of their current crop of leaders.

auth_sentence.content: September - Opposition stages mass protests demanding resignation of President Kuchma whom they accuse of corruption and misrule.
auth_sentence.res_content: September - Opposition stages mass protests demanding resignation of President Kuchma whom they accuse of corruption and misrule.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: September - Opposition stages mass protests demanding resignation of President Kuchma whom they accuse of corruption and misrule.
